revised_title: Magnetic and Meteorological Observatories: Report of the Joint Committee
tldr: The Joint Committee of the Royal Society and the British Association reports on the continuation of magnetic and meteorological observations in British Colonial Observatories. They discuss the results of these observations, including the mean state and secular changes of magnetic elements, diurnal and annual fluctuations, and the existence of a new department of science related to magnetic action. The findings reveal a complex relationship between the sun, the Earth's magnetism, and the whole planetary system.
